verses.name: 1 Kings 20:22
verses.text: And the prophet came to the king of Israel, and said unto him, Go, strengthen thyself, and mark, and see what thou doest: for at the return of the year the king of Syria will come up against thee.

verses.name: 1 Kings 20:23
verses.text: And the servants of the king of Syria said unto him, Their gods are gods of the hills; therefore they were stronger than we; but let us fight against them in the plain, and surely we shall be stronger than they.

verses.name: 1 Kings 20:24
verses.text: And do this thing, Take the kings away, every man out of his place, and put captains in their rooms:
